altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main

altTitles.ja: ギミック！

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

title.en: Wolf Falls in Love with Moon

altTitles.ja: オオカミは月に恋をする

altTitles.ja-ro: Ōkami wa tsuki ni koi o suru

altTitles.vi: Nàng Sói Trót Phải Lòng Với Mặt Trăng

description.en: The serialized version of [this one-shot](https://mangadex.org/title/d3caccaa-7ede-415d-ada4-b949ac8b66f5) by Komaki Maria!
description.vi: Phần tiếp theo của [one-shot này](https://mangadex.org/title/d3caccaa-7ede-415d-ada4-b949ac8b66f5) từ tác giả Komaki Maria!

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について
お隣遊び

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.pl: Opowieść o Tym, Jak Piękna Uczennica Zza Granicy Mieszkająca Po Sąsziedzku Zaczęła Odwiedzać Mnie W Domu, Po Tym Jak Pomogłem Zagubionej Małej Dziewczynce

altTitles.pt-br: A História de como Uma Linda Estudante Estrangeira que Mora ao Lado Começou a Visitar Minha Casa Depois que Ajudei Uma Menininha Perdida

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.ja: ストーカー×ストーカー

description.en: Getta and Taiyo, college students who were close friends. One day, Taiyo finds out that he was stalking Getta. However, Getta is a stalker of the sun, and collects the baby teeth of the sun.

title.en: Shinsen Tao Niang - Kyuutei no Nie

altTitles.ja: 神仙桃娘 宮廷の賛

altTitles.zh: 神仙桃娘 宫廷祭品

altTitles.vi: Đào Nương Tiên Tử - Báu vật Vương Triều

description.en:
Every part of a Tao Niang’s* body exists for the crown prince. Though she was summoned to carry out her obligation as a Tao Niang on the Crown Prince Zi Jing's coming-of-age-ceremony (Guan Li), his attitude towards her was cold?! The sweet, aesthetic romance set inside the Chinese imperial court.

---
Note: *Tao Niang, allegedly a Chinese urban myth about women who were only fed peaches and then sold as slaves. As peaches in Chinese culture represent immortality or longevity, the urban myth conveys these women were bought for either blood, flesh, or pleasure. In this context, 桃娘 is not to be confused with one of its modern Japanese usages (momo musume), where it's used as a term for the poster girls of peaches.

Sunghoon was a normal high schooler until one day, he finds out he is engaged to a tiger from Korean mythology. It is foretold that the world will end unless Sunghoon marries the tiger. This story begins with the cute smile of the tiger girl.  
  
*Notice: This series reads like a manga, from right-to-left.*

altTitles.ja: 霧尾ファンクラブ

description.en: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.
description.ja:
女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

title.en: Gacha wo Mawashite Nakama wo Fuyasu Saikyou no Bishoujo Gundan wo Tsukuriagero

altTitles.ja: ガチャを回して仲間を増やす 最強の美少女軍団を作り上げろ THE COMIC

altTitles.en: You Increase Families and Make Beautiful Girl Army Corps, and Put it Up

altTitles.id: Menjadi Sultan untuk Menarik Gacha dan Ciptakan Tim Waifu Terkuat

altTitles.ms: Tarik Gacha dan Buat Pasukan Gadis Cantik Terkuat untuk Bertarung Bersamamu

altTitles.ru: Использование лотереи для усиления моих компаньонов и создания армейского корпуса сильнейших девушек

description.en: For some reason, he was invited to another world after he rolled the gacha like he usually does. The gacha from the social game is available in his trusted smartphone. It was a convenient and cheat tool that can give out equipment and beautiful girl characters. He now aims to create the world's strongest army of beautiful girls in another world.
description.ja: ごく普通のソシャゲ廃人・大倉平八はガチャでゲットしたURアイテム【異世界への招待状】を使用したことにより、異世界転移してしまった。転移した直後にモンスターに襲われ、完全に詰んだかにみえた平八であったが—— スマホのガチャから美少女ユニットが具現化して現れた!?可愛い（壊れ）ガチャキャラと行く異世界ファンタジー！

description.en:
Public defender Luka stumbles into a conflict between angels and demons while investigating a case. He meets Albert, who’s secretly a demon, and their relationship quickly deepens.

Just as things start to heat up, Luka discovers Albert’s true identity—and learns he may be involved with a mysterious group that’s wreaking havoc in the human world. Now, Luka feels lost and uncertain about everything.

altTitles.ja: 今日もベランダで

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

altTitles.ja: 私たちはカケちがっている

description.en: The story follows the shy and elegant "Idomu" Takaku, who becomes interested in his beautiful classmate Hazuki Shinohara, who sits beside him in class. She seems to keep everyone else at a distance, but the truth is that she has no idea how to communicate with others. Hazuki is secretly interested in Idomu as well, but the two have no idea how to communicate their feelings to each other.

altTitles.ja: 失敗家族

description.en: A reclusive son, a daughter looking for sugar daddies, and a cheating husband. "This family is a failure." Noriko, a housewife who thinks so, has no dreams or hopes for the future, and her days just pass by. However, her fate changes dramatically when she impulsively kills her husband's boss. "The only way for the whole family to live happily is to hide the body." A strange bond is formed as the broken family cooperates in concealing the body.

altTitles.ja: はなにあらし

description.en: Unbeknownst to their friends and classmates, Nanoha and Chidori are dating. Watch as they try to keep their relationship secret!
description.es: A las espaldas de sus amigas y compañeras the salón, Nanoha y Chidori están saliendo juntas. ¡Velas tratando de mantener su relación en secreto!

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! - Scummy Bandman Bocchi (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: クズバンドマンぼっち
帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

altTitles.ja: ウルトラマン

description.en: (from ebookjapan):Kazuo Umezu's "Ultraman" was serialized at the same time as the 1966 TV broadcast! The fierce battles with popular monsters such as the Baltan and Mefilas aliens are fully recorded along with the color pages from the serialization and the chapter covers!Kazuo Umezu's very famous manga adaptation of the first Ultraman series.

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! - Your Brightness & Your Kindness (Doujinshi)

description.en:
**Pairing**: Hitori Gotou x Ikuyo Kita

Note: These are two separate doujins 'Your Brightness' and it's sequel 'Your Kindness' that were sold together digitally.

Moto Kizoku Reijou de Mikon no Haha Desuga, Musumetachi ga Kawaii Sugite Boukenshagyo mo Ku ni Narimasen

altTitles.ja: 元貴族令嬢で未婚の母ですが、娘たちが可愛すぎて冒険者業も苦になりません
元貴族令嬢で未婚の母ですが、娘たちが可愛すぎて冒険者業も苦になりません＠COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Kizoku Reijou de Mikon no Haha Desuga, Musumetachi ga Kawaii Sugite Boukenshagyo mo Ku ni Narimasen＠COMIC

altTitles.en: Even Though I'm a Former Noble and a Single Mother, My Daughters Are Too Cute and Working as an Adventurer Isn't Too Much of a Hassle

altTitles.th: อดีตขุนนางสาวโสดกับชีวิตโลดโผนผจญภัยเพื่อลูกสาวสุดน่ารัก

altTitles.zh: 虽然是原贵族大小姐单身妈妈，但女儿太可爱了当冒险者也不会辛苦

description.en:
A world where monsters run rampant.

A noblewoman falls from grace and loses everything after being falsely accused.

But, she started a fresh life as an 'Immortal.' She became an adventurer capable of defeating disaster-rank monsters and taking the heads off ancient dragons with a single swing of her blade. However, behind that cool exterior… beats the heart of a ridiculously over-indulgent mother?!

"What should I do, my daughters are just too cute?!"

She wields her deadly sword for the sake of motherly love! Ogres flee and dragons tremble at the sight of this overpowered adventurer!

The fantasy adventure of the Doting Mother Sword Demon begins now!

altTitles.vi: Yêu Quái Cô Đơn Và Cô Bé Bị Mù

altTitles.ja: ぼっち怪物と盲目少女

altTitles.pt-br: O Monstro Solitário e a Garota Cega

description.en:
A lonely monster, living in seclusion in the forest, wishes she could live amidst humans despite her frightening appearance. 
Everything changes when she starts getting a visitor–a blind human girl who’s fascinated with her mysterious forest friend. 
As the monster and the girl grow attached in their secluded world, their love proves that beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
description.pt-br:
Nas profundezas de uma floresta, uma garota-fera vive seus dias solitária, até que um dia ela encontra uma invasora, 
uma jovem moça cega que acaba adentrando a floresta atraída pelas flores. 
Pela primeira vez um humano não sentiu medo e demonstrou ser gentil com ela.
Encantada pela situação, a fera mente e começa a se encontrar com a jovem, contando-lhe histórias e aventuras. 
E aos poucos, essa conexão especial começa a aquecer o coração dessa fera solitária.

altTitles.ja: 恋するサイコの白雪くん

description.en:
I will kill everyone for your sake.

"Hey, I think I like you!" Shirayuki says with a smile.
Haruki endures relentless bullying from a trio of classmates. One day, a beautiful transfer student named Shirayuki suddenly approaches him and asks if he would date him if the bullying stopped. Haruki dismisses it as a joke. But the next day, one of his tormentors disappears. Then another. One thing's for sure—Shirayuki is a psychopath that lacks common sense and empathy.
description.es:
Mataré a todos por tu bien.

«¡Eh, creo que me gustas!» Shirayuki dice con una sonrisa.
Haruki soporta el acoso implacable de un grupo de compañeros de clase. Un día, un hermoso estudiante trasladado llamado Shirayuki se le acerca de repente y le pregunta si saldría con él si cesara el acoso. Haruki lo toma a broma. Pero al día siguiente, uno de sus acosadores desaparece, y luego otro y después otro. Una cosa es seguro: Shirayuki es una psicópata que carece de sentido común y empatía.
description.ja: 「僕、キミのこと好きになっちゃったかもしれない」そう言って白雪は微笑んだ。同級生３人に壮絶なイジメを受けていた晴樹は、ある日突然転校してきた美少年、白雪に「イジメがなくなったら僕と付き合ってくれる？」と持ち掛けられる。冗談だと聞き流した晴樹だったが、次の日から同級生が一人、また一人と姿を消していく。恋した転校生の白雪は、サイコパスだった。
description.vi:
Tôi sẽ giết tất cả mọi người vì cậu.

"Này, hình như tôi thích cậu mất rồi!" Shirayuki mỉm cười nói.
Haruki đã phải chịu đựng bắt nạt không ngớt bởi bộ ba bắt nạt cầm đầu lớp. Bổng một ngày, Shirayuki, một học sinh chuyển trường xinh đẹp đột nhiên xuất hiện tiếp cận Haruki và hỏi liệu cậu sẽ hẹn hò với cậu ấy nếu việc bắt nạt chấm dứt. Haruki bác bỏ và chỉ coi đó là trò đùa cho đến ngày hôm sau, một trong số kẻ bắt nạt biến mất và lần lượt từng người một. Chỉ có một điều chắc chắn rằng - Shirayuki là một tên tâm thần thiếu nhận thức thông thường và sự đồng cảm.
description.es-la:
Mataré a todos por tu bien.

«¡Eh, creo que me gustas!» Shirayuki dice con una sonrisa.
Haruki soporta el acoso implacable de un grupo de compañeros de clase. Un día, un hermoso estudiante trasladado llamado Shirayuki se le acerca de repente y le pregunta si saldría con él si cesara el acoso. Haruki lo toma a broma. Pero al día siguiente, uno de sus acosadores desaparece, y luego otro y después otro. Una cosa es seguro: Shirayuki es una psicópata que carece de sentido común y empatía.

title.en: Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: プロジェクトセカイ カラフルステージ！ feat.初音ミク　コミックアンソロジー

description.en: Official anthology for the game Project Sekai

altTitles.ja: よーじょらいふ！

description.en: Akihiko Shimura, 20 years old (male). When I woke up in the morning, I was a little blonde loli.
description.ru: Акихико Симура — 20-летний мужчина, который, проснувшись как-то утром, стал маленькой девочкой-блондинкой.

description.en:
I see what Angels see and do what Demons do. Those are the words a psychopath named Dennis saw when he found "The Channeler"... A powerful artifact that two massive evil corporations (Ravenfort) and (Blue Hand)will stop at nothing to get it back. at the same time Dennis Trauma haunts his day and night, while his adopted brother is still suffering from the loss of his wife ten years ago to a mysterious disease. #thriller_mystery
#mystery #thriller

title.en: I made a pact with a Succubus

altTitles.ja: クリぼっちだから悪魔のお姉さんと契約 してみた

title.en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha to Yobareta Ato ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero: The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family

description.en: In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

altTitles.ja: 見える子ちゃん

altTitles.de: Mieruko-chan - Die Geister, die mich riefen

altTitles.th: มิเอรุโกะจัง ใครว่าหนูเห็นผี

description.en:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and… ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
[Alt Raw (niconico Manga)](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)
description.ja: ある日突然、普通の人には見えない異形な存在が見えるようになってしまった「みこ」。彼女は彼らから逃げるでもなく、立ち向かうでもなく…精一杯シカトしつづける事に。
description.ru: Мико — старшеклассница, проклятая шестым чувством; у нее есть способность видеть призраков- Она пытается жить обычной жизнью, но трудно, когда призраки продолжают преследовать ее- Она также может видеть души людей, и она понимает, что люди — настоящие монстры.В один «прекрасный» день старшеклассница внезапно начала видеть призраков! Она не может от этого избавиться, но изо всех сил старается вести себя так, будто вообще их не видит. История девушки с шестым чувством начинается!
description.uk: В один “прекрасний” день старшокласниця раптово почала бачити привидів! Вона не може від цього позбутися, але з усіх сил намагається поводитися так, ніби взагалі їх не бачить.

altTitles.ja: 獄卒クラーケン

description.en: Controlling the Queendom of Sebek's female prison with the Power of the Kraken!
description.id: Shimizu Kuuma, seorang laki-laki, yang baru saja kembali dari wawancara kerja yang tidak bisa dia selesaikan, tiba-tiba dikirim ke dunia lain, di sana dia bertemu dengan seorang gadis tertentu yang membantunya dan memberinya pekerjaan di penjara tetapi yang tidak dia ketahui adalah bahwa ini hanya jebakan untuk membawanya dan agar dia bisa 'dinikmati' oleh Bosnya, kemudian setelah dia dibantai dan dibuang ke laut dan hampir mati dia diselamatkan oleh Kraken yang menceritakan kisahnya tentang bagaimana Dia diselamatkan oleh seorang gadis tertentu yang adalah seorang tahanan, jadi mereka membuat kesepakatan, kemudian dia menyelamatkan gadis itu dan melakukan Pembalasan.
description.ja: 就職難に悩む男子学生・クウマは、いきなり異世界に飛ばされてしまう。そこで女監獄・海獄城に連れて行かれたクウマは、海の覇者・魔獣クラーケンと融合し、絶大なイカの異能力を得る。陰謀で死刑囚にされたゼイナ姫の救出を託され、クウマは海獄城に獄卒として潜り込むが、そこには個性豊かな女囚たちが待ち受けていた……。クウマは女囚たちをイカの力で心もカラダも攻略し、ゼイナ姫を助けることが出来るのか!?
description.es-la: Shimizu Kuuma es un chico que siempre devuelve los favores. Un día, al regresar de una entrevista de trabajo fallida, es repentinamente transportado a otro mundo. En este mundo es salvado por una chica, quien le ofrece un trabajo como guardia de una prisión de mujeres. Sin pensarlo dos veces, Kuuma acepta, pero no se imaginó, que sería casi asesinado por una prisionera. Ellas tiran su cuerpo al mar, pero antes de morir, la criatura más fuerte del mar, el Kraken, lo salva y le ofrece fusionarse con él a cambio de algo. Es así como Kuuma sobrevive, consigue los poderes del Kraken y está dispuesto a tomar el control de la prisión para devolverle el favor al Kraken.

description.en:
The daily experiences of modern monster girls.   
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.
description.pt-br:
As experiências diárias de garotas monstro modernas.
Quadrinhos originais por Shepherd0821

altTitles.ja: Fate/Prototype 蒼銀のフラグメンツ

description.en: An adaptation of the novel *Fate/Prototype: Sougin no Fragments*.
description.fr:
Adaptation manga du light novel *Fate/Prototype -Fragments d'Azur et d'Acier-* de Hikaru Sakurai et Nakahara

Manaka Sajô est issue d'une puissante famille de mages et est considérée comme un véritable prodige. C'est donc naturellement qu'elle est choisie pour participer à l'une des Guerre du Saint Graal.
Malgré son jeune âge, elle parvient à invoquer le plus puissant des Servant : Saber. Mais leur relation va très vite se dégrader car ils n'ont pas du tout la même conception du monde et de la guerre.

altTitles.ja: 冬月

description.en: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

title.en: Walking with Death: Start From Murloc Dungeons

altTitles.zh: 与死亡同行：从鱼人地下城开始

description.en: After unlocking the hidden job "Death Walker", it is only natural for me to become a legendary adventurer... right?

After Lu Chen entered the cranial neuron quantum transferring game《Empyrean God Realm》—he found himself stripped of his human character, becoming the weakest wild monster in the game, a "Weak Gnoll." Facing players who are ready to use him to level up, Lu Chen lifts the broken Gnoll club and starts to upgrade from a Lv.1 Gnoll. As Lu Chen keeps on killing more and more species, gaining new talents, and levelling up talents, his status keeps getting enhanced. Normal, Strong, Super strong... Soon enough, he...

altTitles.ja: 亡びの国の征服者
亡びの国の征服者～魔王は世界を征服するようです～

altTitles.ja-ro: Horobi no Kuni no Seifukusha: Maou wa Sekai wo Seifukusuru Youdesu

altTitles.en: The Conqueror From a Dying Kingdom
The Demon King Seems to Conquer the World

altTitles.uk: Король Демонів - Підкорювач мертвої землі, - здається, завойовує світ

altTitles.zh-hk: 亡國的征服者～魔王將征服世界～

altTitles.ja-ro: Horobi no Kuni no Seifukusha: Maou wa Sekai wo Seifuku suru you desu

description.en:
Never having known the warmth of family, he was reborn in another world. Named Yuri, he is doted on by his parents and lives a new life in peace – as it should be. However, the country where Yuri and the others live is threatened by the “other humans” who dominate the vast expanse of the continent and is in danger of dying. Yuri and his family can’t stay out of it and are caught in the middle of the war… The Knights' House, the sword of the kingdom that wields a lance and kakedori birds. The death of his uncle, who was the leader of the Hovu family, brings Yuri’s father back to the world of knights, who had left the house to hate killing each other. Yuri is forced to attend the Knights’ Academy, where knights are trained, and the encounter there will drastically change the fate of Yuri and the kingdom. This is the story of a man who fights for the people he loves and later became known throughout the world as the “Demon King.”

---
As a self-professed no-lifer, Yuri idles his days away in front of a computer. This all changes the moment his life in Japan comes to an abrupt end and he finds himself reborn in the strange new world of the Shiyalta Kingdom. His new life includes everything he once lacked: loving parents, a comfortable home, and a promising future breeding and raising birds on his dad’s ranch. For centuries, the kingdom he now calls home has enjoyed peace and prosperity, shielded by friendly nations that, like Shiyalta itself, were established with the collapse of a once-great empire. War is a distant problem, relevant only to Shiyalta’s ruling families whose warriors periodically set out to join the fighting upon massive birds trained by Yuri’s dad and others. But this peaceful existence can’t last forever. Something rotten lies at the heart of the kingdom, and it doesn’t take someone with Yuri’s exceptional intelligence to realize that those distant battles will only remain irrelevant for so long.
description.ja: 世間に見放された孤独な男は、異世界に転生を果たす。ユーリと名付けられた男は、前世で与えられなかった”家族愛”に戸惑うも、新たな生に希望を見出しつつあった。だが、異種族の侵略を受け戦火は彼と家族の間近にまで迫り!? ユーリは家族のため終わりなき戦いへ身を投じる――。後に世界に名を轟かす男が歩んだ覇道の物語、ここに開幕。
description.uk: Людина, що залишила світ наприкінці своєї самотності, перетворилася на немовля Юрі. Хвиля “сімейної любові”, що обрушилася на нього, якої він не був обдарований у минулому житті, збиває його з пантелику, але він знаходить у своєму новому житті надію... Проте з початком вторгнення іншої раси, полум'я війни насувається на нього та його родину. І для того, щоб захистити своїх близьких, Юрі змушений кинутися до низки нескінченних битв. Чи впорається він?! Тут починається історія про переможний шлях людини, чиє ім'я пізніше прогримить на весь світ.

description.en:
“I was given a building as an inheritance?”

From a nobody who does all kinds of odd jobs and lived a hard life, he was given a chance to become a landlord right in the middle of Gangnam!

But, the condition for this inheritance is to ‘operate a restaurant for 5 years.’

‘Moreover, I can sense a chill down my spine thanks to the weird customers that came in for today’s store opening……Do I really just need to prepare food?’

“So then…all the guests who came in yesterday…”

“They were ghosts.”

Every night starting from 11 o’ clock until 1 o’clock, we will now be open!

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティー辞めます。

altTitles.en: I Quit the Party of the Brave.

description.en:
Raniel Van Trias, the Ashen Wizard, is a highly skilled mage set on defeating the Demon King. After years of fighting alongside the renowned Hero's Party and multiple encounters with the Demon King, he is ousted from the party, left with a curse on his heart, forced to lose half his lifespan, and transformed into a woman! 

Undeterred, Raniel becomes an assistant professor at the Royal Apelia Academy as Rania and searches for a way to lift the curse, oblivious to how challenging his task may be...

---

[Official Japanese release](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/148780)

[Official French release](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/1483)
description.ko:
마왕을 무찌르고 세상을 구원하기 위해 모인 최강의 용사파티가 있었다.

하지만 마왕 토벌엔 관심이 없고편한 전장만 찾는 용사 파티에 환멸을 느낀 잿빛 마법사 라니엘은,결국 파티를 때려치우고 고향으로 돌아와 스승을 만난다.그런 그에게 라니엘의 스승인 로셀은명문 아카데미, 아플리아의 조교수 자리를 권하게 된다.

"아니, 이걸 왜 못하지?"
"그냥 회로 생성하고 쓰면 되는데?"

하지만 세계관 최강자도 막상 가르침에는 소질이 없는 듯 한데...

어찌저찌 아플리아 아카데미에 취직하게 된 인류 최강 전력.먼치킨 마법사의 좌충우돌 아카데미 조교수기가 시작된다!

altTitles.en: Escape the Dungeon Is So Hard

altTitles.es-la: Escapar de una mazmorra es muy difícil

description.en:
Go Insung did not pass onto hell or heaven after suddenly dying, but instead onto a dungeon. A place in between the afterlife and the world.

And it’s no normal dungeon, but one with a system.

While being watched by the numerous dead of the afterlife, Go Insung has to clear the dungeon with the other challengers in order to escape.

Nearly a decade ago, the mysterious race known as "The Entities" arrived in this world.

Initially, people were fearful towards the unknown lifeforms. However, upon discovering that their "moulting" could bring tremendous progress and benefits, people gradually began to accept them, bridging up the gap between different species. 

Yet, just as celebrations of peace and prosperity were underway, seeds of destruction began sow silently, threatening to dismantle the entire system…
description.zh-hk:
神秘的種族「異人」來到這個世界已快屆滿十年，起初人們對於未知生命都感到非常恐懼。

但在發現他們的「蛻皮」能帶來巨大的進步與利益之後，便逐漸地接納了他們，消弭了異種之間的隔閡。

然而，就在祝賀和平共榮的慶典舉行之際，將整個體制破壞殆盡的種子卻在悄然蔓延⋯。

altTitles.ru: Младший сын семьи Пэн из Хэбэя

description.en:
Habuk Peng Family’s best strength, Peng Jihyuk heads to the Nakho Region to save his family that fell into destruction due to the attack of the Demon Sect, but everything was a trap. At the moment of death, he felt the wrath of being the only one left from his beloved family.

‘Again…if you give me a chance…!”

Peng Jihyuk, who thought he was dead, woke up in the body of Young Master Sa, of the Peng Family.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.ko:
하북팽가 최고의 전력, 도왕 팽지혁. 마교의 습격으로 멸문지화에 빠진 가문을 구하러 낙호곡으로 향하지만 모든 것은 함정이었고, 죽음의 순간 자신이 사랑했던 가문에게 버림받았다는 사실에 분노한다.
'다시... 내게 한 번만 더 기회가 주어진다면...!'
죽은 줄 알았던 팽지혁은 방구석 둔재, 하북팽가 사공자의 몸에서 눈을 뜬다.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.ru:
Пэн Джи Хёк — лучший воин семейства Пэн из Хэбэя. Из-за атаки Магё его семейство почти исчезло... Для её спасения он отправляется в дальнее путешествие, во время которого попадает в ловушку. За мгновение до смерти он узнал, что его горячо любимая семья от него отказалась, и пришёл в ярость.
«Если бы у меня был ещё один шанс!..»
Он уже был готов к встрече со смертью, но когда открыл глаза — оказался в теле молодого господина.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.zh:
一代刀王重生废柴四公子！
为报恩逆袭勇斗魔教！
名门彭家的最强战斗力，刀王彭枝奕。为了拯救因魔教的袭击而陷入灭门之灾的彭家，彭枝奕前往落虎谷与魔教教主决战，却发现这一切都是个陷阱。临死之前得知自己被深爱的家族抛弃的彭枝奕愤怒不已。彭枝奕原以为自己死了，没想到却在彭家四公子的身体里重新醒了过来。

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)

description.en: Park Yun-yeong has a mysterious power which allows her to see ghastly creatures that seem to inhabit our world but not interact with it - unless they notice you acknowledge their existence. That’s when they stop being harmless.
description.pt-br: Park Yun-yeong tem um poder misterioso que permite que ela veja criaturas horríveis que parecem habitar nosso mundo, mas não interagem com ela, a menos que percebam que você reconhece sua existência. É quando eles param de ser inofensivos.

altTitles.ja: キャンドルと魔女

description.en:
In the forest, the young girl met a cheerful demon with a candle head.

"Why are you alone? Why are you so filthy?"
"...Your flames are pretty."

"Eh? I like you. Form a contract with me."

What awaited the girl was a warm meal and a soft bed-?!
The crazy demon, Candle, and the mysterious girl, Little Mum, begin their strange life together.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.ja: パリピ孔明

description.en: General of the Three Kingdoms, Kongming had struggled his whole life, facing countless battles that made him into the accomplished strategist he was. So on his deathbed, he wished only to be reborn into a peaceful world...and was sent straight to modern-day party-central, Tokyo! Can even a brilliant strategist like Kongming adapt to the wild beats and even wilder party people?!
description.ja: 五丈原の戦いで死期を迎えた名軍師・諸葛亮孔明は、若い肉体に戻り、現代日本へと転生した！ 渋谷のパリピ達に誘われ、たどり着いたのはダンスミュージックが鳴り響くチャラめなクラブ。そこでシンガーを目指す月見英子と出逢い、孔明の二度目の人生が幕を開けた！ 三国志時代、天下泰平のために生きた彼は、なんの為に生きるのか－－!!
description.ko:
오장원 전투에서 최후를 맞이한 명군사 제갈량(공명)은
젊은 육체로 돌아가 현대 일본에 환생한다!
시부야의 파티피플들에게 이끌려 도착 곳은
댄스 뮤직이 울려 퍼지는 경박스러운 클럽.
그곳에서 가수를 꿈꾸는 츠키미 에이코와 만나며
공명의 두 번째 인생이 막을 연다!
description.ru: Знаменитый стратег и военачальник Чжугэ Лян (Кунмин), погибший в битве при Годжохаре в полях Учжан, вернулся в молодое тело и перевоплотился в современной Японии, где он встретился с начинающей певицей Цукими Эйко, песни которой запали ему в сердце.
description.vi: Bậc thầy quân sự nổi tiếng - Gia Cát Lượng Khổng Minh - người đã chết trong trận Ngũ Trượng Nguyên trở lại với cơ thể khi còn trẻ và tái sinh về Nhật Bản hiện đại. Được những người mê tiệc tùng ở Shibuya dẫn đi, Khổng Minh đã tới hộp đêm vang vọng tiếng nhạc EDM. Ở đó Khổng Minh đã gặp Tsukimi Eiko, người có mục tiêu trở thành ca sĩ, cũng chính là người đã vén lên tấm màn cuộc sống thứ hai của ông. Người sống vì thiên hạ thái bình ở thời Tam Quốc như ông sẽ sống vì điều gì đây...!?
description.pt-br: General dos Três Reinos, Kongming lutou toda a sua vida, enfrentando inúmeras batalhas que o transformaram no estrategista talentoso que ele era. Então, em seu leito de morte, ele desejava apenas renascer em um mundo pacífico… e foi enviado direto para o centro de festas moderno, Tóquio! Pode até mesmo um estrategista brilhante como Kongming se adaptar às batidas selvagens e às pessoas festeiras ainda mais selvagens?!
description.zh-hk: 三國時代的孔明在五丈原抱憾離世，如今他恢復成年輕時的模樣，以一身古時打扮來到現代日本‧澀谷。突兀的裝扮讓人以為他是在COSPLAY，後來被人帶往夜店狂歡，他在那裡認識了一心想成為歌手的月見英子。聽了她的歌聲大為感動，於是自告奮勇擔任她的軍師！來到現代，孔明要如何發揮他的軍事長才來協助英子完成「霸業」呢…？
